  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:oai.cnice.mec.es:bioo_es_20070518_2_0030411</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>ISFRRP-MEPSYD</catalog>
            <entry>bioo_es_20070518_2_0030411</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="es">Clasificación de las plantas</string>
            <string language="en">Classification of plants</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Klassifikation der Betriebe</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Classification des usines</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Classificação das plantas</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Classificazione delle piante</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ταξινόμηση των εγκαταστάσεων</string>
          </title>
          <language>es</language>
          <description>
            <string language="es">Se describen las características generales de los grupos de plantas y se analizan las características principales y los ciclos reproductivos de las Briofitas, las Pteridofitas y los grupos más representativos de Pteridofitas.</string>
            <string language="en">Topic describing the general characteristics of the groups of plants and analysing the main characteristics and the reproductive cycles of the bryophytes, pteridophytes and the most representative groups of pteridophytes.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">biosfera</string>
            <string language="en">biosphere</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">Plantas</string>
            <string language="en">Plants</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">biología</string>
            <string language="en">Biology</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <value>collection</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Thema, welches die allgemeinen Eigenschaften der 
Gruppen der Betriebe beschreibt und die Haupteigenschaften und der 
reproduktiven Schleifen der bryophytes, der pteridophytes und der 
repräsentativgruppen von pteridophytes analysiert.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Sujet décrivant les caractéristiques 
générales des groupes d'usines et analysant les caractéristiques 
principales et des cycles reproducteurs des bryophytes, des 
pteridophytes et des groupes de pteridophytes les plus 
représentatifs.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Tópico que descreve as características gerais 
dos grupos das plantas e que analisa as características principais e 
dos ciclos reproductive dos bryophytes, de pteridophytes e dos grupos 
os mais representativos dos pteridophytes.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Soggetto che descrive le caratteristiche generali
dei gruppi delle piante e che analizza le caratteristiche principali e
dei cicli riproduttivi dei bryophytes, dei pteridophytes e dei gruppi 
dei pteridophytes più rappresentativi.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Θέμα που περιγράφει τα γενικά χαρακτηριστικά των 
ομάδων εγκαταστάσεων και που αναλύει τα βασικά χαρακτηριστικά και
τους αναπαραγωγικούς κύκλους των bryophytes, pteridophytes και
τις αντιπροσωπευτικότερες ομάδες pteridophytes.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Biosphäre</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Betriebe</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Biologie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">biosphère</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Usines</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Biologie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">biosphere</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Plantas</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Biologia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">biosfera</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Piante</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Biologia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">βιόσφαιρα</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Εγκαταστάσεις</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Η βιολογία</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
